name: Louma
description:
Story:
The evil never sleeps, it just wants one thing, its power back. Stop it and search in the Dungeon after artefacts. But be aware, it’s getting more dangerous the deeper you get.


Procedural generated floors:
The World of Louma will be generated procedural. Fight the enemies and find a way to your destination. Search after keys, artefacts and collect resources.


Categories:
In the beginning there are different categories between you can choose. Each category has its individual abilities.


Upgrade your character:
You can upgrade your weapon and buy potions to get a better level. Your level defines your life/power.
